PLAYER_CASTLE_CELL_DESC: This small room has chains on the wall where those out of favor are locked up.
PLAYER_CASTLE_STORAGE_DESC: Crates of supplies line this room.
PLAYER_CASTLE_GUARDROOM_DESC: This strategically placed room offers a good view and easy access to other parts of the castle.
PLAYER_CASTLE_STUDY_DESC: This is the private office of the sovereign of the castle.
PLAYER_CASTLE_ENTRY_DESC: This is the grand entrance for the castle.
PLAYER_CASTLE_DINING_ROOM_DESC: A large fireplace dominates one wall where private meals are served.
PLAYER_CASTLE_BARRACKS_DESC: This long narrow room contains bunks where the soldiers of the castle live.
PLAYER_CASTLE_LIBRARY_DESC: Built in shelves, filled with books, line the walls of this room.
PLAYER_CASTLE_MEDITATION_ROOM_DESC: This room is tucked into a quiet area of the castle where one can seek peace of mind.
PLAYER_CASTLE_COURTYARD0_DESC: This open area is a central accessway of the castle.
PLAYER_CASTLE_AVIARY_DESC: Birdsong greets you as vibrant colored birds flit from perch to perch under a net ceiling.
PLAYER_CASTLE_THRONE_ROOM_DESC: High ceilings and tall pillars grace a dias with a gilt throne.
PLAYER_CASTLE_TEMPLE_DESC: Ceremonies to the gods are held in this room.
PLAYER_CASTLE_CHAPEL_DESC: Small shrines to all of the gods line this room, with votive candles and inscence before them.
PLAYER_CASTLE_KENNEL_DESC: Many small huts and cages here house the hunting hounds of the castle.
PLAYER_CASTLE_CRYPT_DESC: Majestic sarcophagi hold the mortal remains of the lords of the castle.
PLAYER_CASTLE_BEASTIARY_DESC: Stout iron cages here hold exotic animals from all over.
PLAYER_CASTLE_SITTING_ROOM_DESC: This is a private meeting place where the nobles of the castle entertain guests.
PLAYER_CASTLE_TORTURE_CHAMBER_DESC: Sinister looking metal contraptions are hulk in the shadows of this room.
PLAYER_CASTLE_BANQUET_HALL_DESC: Long tables line this room waiting for majestic feasts to be served.
PLAYER_CASTLE_SHRINE_DESC: This area is sacred to one of the gods. Tapestries portraying its deeds are on the walls.
PLAYER_CASTLE_LABRATORY_DESC: Benches covered in glass flasks and retorts lines this room where the mages of the castle experiment.
PLAYER_CASTLE_GALLERY0_DESC: This long room has many open high windows to let light in on the statuary and artwork.
PLAYER_CASTLE_OBSERVATORY_DESC: This room has a wide view of the heavens, and the points of the compass can be seen marked on the floor.
PLAYER_CASTLE_SMITHY_DESC: A wide fireplace holds a forge where iron was worked.
PLAYER_CASTLE_CLASSROOM_DESC: This slate walled room is where the noble youths are taught.
PLAYER_CASTLE_BATH_HOUSE_DESC: Shiny copper tubing brings headted water to elegant marble baths.
PLAYER_CASTLE_ANTECHAMBER_DESC: This small room is a waiting room for guests of the castle.
PLAYER_CASTLE_REFECTORY_DESC: The clerics of the castle eat their meals here.
PLAYER_CASTLE_ROBING_ROOM_DESC: The clerics of the castle prepare for religious ceremonies here.
PLAYER_CASTLE_DRESSING_ROOM_DESC: The racks in this room hold rich garments where the nobles of hte castle adorn themselves.
PLAYER_CASTLE_ARMORY_DESC: Thick walls and a stout door guard weapon and armor racks.
PLAYER_CASTLE_GREAT_HALL_DESC: This enormous room is used to hold court for all the surrounding nobles.
PLAYER_CASTLE_GAME_ROOM_DESC: The stone tables of this room are marked up with playing fields of the board games the castle inhabitants play to pass the time.
PLAYER_CASTLE_TOILET_DESC: A shelf, built into the castle wall is a comfortable palce to sit while a trough leads from underneath over the walls.
PLAYER_CASTLE_HALLWAY_DESC: This is a brief passage leading between portions of the castle.
PLAYER_CASTLE_TROPHY_ROOM_DESC: Taxidermied animals stare at you with glassy eyes from the walls of this room.
PLAYER_CASTLE_LOUNGE_DESC: This compfortable room was where the nobles of the castle relax.
PLAYER_CASTLE_WELL_DESC: There's a deep pit here at the bottom of which you can see water glinting.
PLAYER_CASTLE_PRISON_DESC: Iron cages are set into the walls of this room where the captives of the castle are kept.
PLAYER_CASTLE_KITCHEN_DESC: The large fireplace and prep tables dominate this room where the means of the castle are prepared.
PLAYER_CASTLE_CISTERN0_DESC: The wells in this room hold water to sustain the castle in time of siege.
PLAYER_CASTLE_DORMITORY_DESC: Shelfs with hay pallets line the walls where the servants of the castle sleep.
PLAYER_CASTLE_AUDIENCE_CHAMBER_DESC: An throned dias presides over where the sovereign of the castle holds court.
PLAYER_CASTLE_DIVINATION_ROOM_DESC: Holy oracular symbols line the walls where the priests of the castle strive to see the future.
PLAYER_CASTLE_OFFICE0_DESC: This small room is where the castelean keeps the accounts of the castle.
PLAYER_CASTLE_CORRIDOR_DESC: This is a brief passage leading between portions of the castle.
PLAYER_CASTLE_CONJURING_ROOM_DESC: Mystical symbols line the walls and floor of this room, awaiting a wizard to consult the greater powers.
PLAYER_CASTLE_STABLE_DESC: Wood frames demarcate animal stalls and hay is stashed in the loft.
PLAYER_CASTLE_CHANTRY_DESC: Bright frescos in tribute to the gods can be seen on the walls here.
PLAYER_CASTLE_SERAGLIO_DESC: This is where the unmarried women of the castle live.
PLAYER_CASTLE_HALL_DESC: This enclosed area is used for lesser audiences.
PLAYER_CASTLE_CLOSET_DESC: This is a small room for holding stores.
PLAYER_CASTLE_VAULT_DESC: The strong walls of this room protect the wealth of the castle.
PLAYER_CASTLE_PANTRY_DESC: This is a small store room for the food of the castle.
PLAYER_CASTLE_BEDROOM_DESC: This is a cozy room with a lovely view.
